modName: Triss Merigold - A Witcher-Inspired Preset for RaceMenu
summary: Nord female preset, inspired by the looks of Triss Merigold in the Witcher II : Assassin of Kings
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][size=5][size=3]_________________[/size][/size]


So I tried to recreate Triss Merigold while still adapting her looks to the Skyrim aesthetics. This wasn't meant to be an exact replica, but more of a revamp of Triss' looks in the second game of the series. Here she is, I
hope you will like her ![/size]

[size=5]
REQUIREMENTS[/size]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?][size=3]The Eyes of Beauty[/size]
[/url][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69498/?]SR Freckles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url] (REALLY REALLY REQUIRED)
[/size]
[size=5]OPTIONAL
[size=3]
Install these in this particular order if you want Triss to look exactly like
in the screenshots. Order is important since some textures have to
overwrite the others.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?]Seductive Lips HD[/url]

[size=5]INSTALLATION
[size=3]
[/size][/size]Place the file in your Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets directory.
This directory is automatically created when installing RaceMenu.
In game, open the console, type in "showracemenu" (without the quoting marks), hit enter. Close the console.
Go to the Presets slide, press F9, click on the TrissMerigold preset.

[size=5]PERMISSIONS

[size=3]Do not use or reupload without me granting you permission to do so. Just ask and I likely will, anyway.
If given permission to use or reupload, keep in mind that I want this mod,
and any mod I might do in the future, to be Nexus exclusive. Means no
uploads on any other sites than the Nexus, and no uploads on Steam
Workshop.
If given permission to use or reupload, thank you for crediting me, as well as the people I credited.

[size=5]CREDITS[/size][/size][/size]

Bethesda Softworks for creating Skyrim and giving us all the possibility to mod it with the Creation Kit
Andrzej Zapkowski and CDProjekt RED for The Witcher series
The Nexus sites for hosting our mods and providing us the Nexus Mod Manager
The SKSE team
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481/?]Expired6798[/url] for RaceMenu
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283148/?]Apachii[/url] for ApachiiSkyHair
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027/?]Hvergelmir[/url] for Brows
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756/?]Gabriel Mailhot[/url] for The Eyes of Beauty
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6540414/?]Stephierawx [/url]for SR Freckles
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3350373/?]Groovtama[/url] for XPMSE
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/726673/?]Xenius[/url] for XCE - Xenius Characer Enhancement
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3676578/?]EcthelionOtW[/url] for Seductive Lips HD

[size=5][size=3][size=5][size=3][size=5][size=3][size=5][size=3][size=5]Â SPECIAL THANKS[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]

[/size][/size]
[/center]
